title: TeGC Looking for 2-3 new members. (BASED IN ADELAIDE)
body:
Hey there everyone, Truth Gaming Corps are looking for 2-3 new members based in Adelaide for an upcoming local tournament.

Even if you're not from Adelaide we'd love to welcome you into the club for games and such!

Any position aside from Jungle/Mid available.

Please either comment on here or message me ingame for more details!
